articles.author: Kate Sullivan, Gregory Krieg
articles.title: Trump in Michigan makes play for Arab American and Muslim voters angry over war in Gaza - CNN
articles.description: Former President Donald Trump on Saturday invited several Muslim leaders onstage with him at a campaign rally in Michigan as he courts Arab American and Muslim voters disillusioned or angry over US policy on Israel and Gaza in the critical battleground state.
articles.content: Former President Donald Trump on Saturday invited several Muslim leaders onstage with him at a campaign rally in Michigan as he courts Arab American and Muslim voters disillusioned or angry over US p… [+4380 chars]

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: American Airlines tries new technology to shame line cutters - OregonLive
articles.description: The technology alerts gate agents with an audible sound if a passenger tries to scan their ticket ahead of their assigned boarding group.
articles.content:
American Airlines is testing an audible alert for when people try to board before their group is called.Robert Alexander/Getty Images
